content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":203502,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ロビーに行けばあるかな！？","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder if there’s some in the lobby!?"},{"lineNumber":203503,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この二人はまったく……」","translatedEnglishLine":"These two, seriously..."},{"lineNumber":203504,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なーんだ、そっか……","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, I see..."},{"lineNumber":203505,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんとなく、ホッ","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, I feel relieved."},{"lineNumber":203506,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……本当だろうな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"...It’s true, right?"},{"lineNumber":203507,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おいおい、いないって言ってんだから」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, hey, I said they’re not here."},{"lineNumber":203508,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いーや、こいつは結構こーゆーとこあるからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"No way, this guy is often like this."},{"lineNumber":203509,"originalJapaneseLine":"　隠してたり、若しくは無自覚とかな、","translatedEnglishLine":"He might be hiding something, or perhaps he's unaware."},{"lineNumber":203510,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いくらでも言わない理由は考えられる」","translatedEnglishLine":"There are plenty of reasons why he might not say anything."},{"lineNumber":203511,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……よし、酒だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Alright, let’s have some alcohol."},{"lineNumber":203512,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、陶器！　酒を用意しろ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahaha, Touki! Prepare the drinks!"},{"lineNumber":203513,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今夜はこいつをべろべろに酔わせて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Tonight, we’ll get him completely drunk,"},{"lineNumber":203514,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全部吐かせるぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and make him spill everything!"},{"lineNumber":203515,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よっし！　任せとけ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright! Leave it to me!"},{"lineNumber":203516,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ロビーに行けばあるかな！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder if there’s some in the lobby!?"},{"lineNumber":203517,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前……","translatedEnglishLine":"You..."},{"lineNumber":203518,"originalJapaneseLine":"　酒が飲みたかっただけじゃないだろうな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You didn’t just want to drink, did you...?"},{"lineNumber":203519,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はははっ！　いいな！","translatedEnglishLine":"Hahaha! That’s great!"},{"lineNumber":203520,"originalJapaneseLine":"　決戦前夜なんだ、明日に響かない程度に、","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s the night before the decisive battle; just enough so it doesn’t affect tomorrow,"},{"lineNumber":203521,"originalJapaneseLine":"　パーッとやるか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"let’s have a wild time!"},{"lineNumber":203522,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……兄さんまで」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Even you, big brother."},{"lineNumber":203523,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sigh..."},{"lineNumber":203524,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":203525,"originalJapaneseLine":"「結局、なんの話？」","translatedEnglishLine":"So, what were you talking about after all?"},{"lineNumber":203526,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うーん、なんと言ったものだすかな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Uh, hmm, how should I put it..."},{"lineNumber":203527,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、それより宿屋にあった","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, rather than that, what about the"},{"lineNumber":203528,"originalJapaneseLine":"　木組みのパズルやるだすか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"wooden puzzle we found at the inn?"},{"lineNumber":203529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やるやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, yeah, let's do it."},{"lineNumber":203530,"originalJapaneseLine":"　へへー、オイラ結構こういうの上手いんだよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, I’m actually pretty good at stuff like this."},{"lineNumber":203531,"originalJapaneseLine":"男部屋では酒盛りが始まり、大いに盛り上がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"In the men's room, the drinking party started and got very lively."},{"lineNumber":203532,"originalJapaneseLine":"……あなたはザンスの手で","translatedEnglishLine":"...You were made to drink more than the other brothers by Zansu."},{"lineNumber":203533,"originalJapaneseLine":"他の兄弟達より多く飲まされてしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"You ended up drinking more than the others."},{"lineNumber":203534,"originalJapaneseLine":"賑やかな夜が更けていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"The lively night went on into the late hours."},{"lineNumber":203535,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぷはーっ、風呂は入ったし、飯も食った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Phew, I took a bath and ate a meal."},{"lineNumber":203536,"originalJapaneseLine":"　余は満足じゃー」","translatedEnglishLine":"I am satisfied."},{"lineNumber":203537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「満足じゃー」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m satisfied."},{"lineNumber":203538,"originalJapaneseLine":"ナギとレリコフの二人が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagi and Rerikofu,"},{"lineNumber":203539,"originalJapaneseLine":"どさーっと布団に飛び込んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"plopped down into the futon."},{"lineNumber":203540,"originalJapaneseLine":"「食べた後にすぐ寝るんじゃないの」","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn’t it bad to go to sleep right after eating?"},{"lineNumber":203541,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあまあ、今日くらいは。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, well, just for today."},{"lineNumber":203542,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お茶飲む人ー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Who wants some tea?"},{"lineNumber":203543,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーい、ちょーだい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, please."},{"lineNumber":203544,"originalJapaneseLine":"「飲むー」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want some."},{"lineNumber":203545,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、なんでもかんでも","translatedEnglishLine":"Good grief, making Reset do absolutely everything..."},{"lineNumber":203546,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リセットにやらせて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Making Reset do it all..."},{"lineNumber":203547,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よっしゃ、こういう夜のお約束やろーぜー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let’s do the usual for a night like this!"},{"lineNumber":203548,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お約束？　トランプとか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"The usual? Like playing cards?"},{"lineNumber":203549,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ににんにん、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ninin nin,"},{"lineNumber":203550,"originalJapaneseLine":"　怪談ならウズメにお任せ","translatedEnglishLine":"Leave ghost stories to Uzume."},{"lineNumber":203551,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんて色気のない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"How unromantic..."},{"lineNumber":203552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こういう時にすることって言ったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"When it comes to what to do at times like this,"},{"lineNumber":203553,"originalJapaneseLine":"　恋の話って相場が決まってるでしょー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"talking about love is the standard, right?"},{"lineNumber":203554,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふえっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh!?"},{"lineNumber":203555,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、スシヌが一番反応した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, Sushinu reacted the most."},{"lineNumber":203556,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なになに？　なんかあるのかなー？","translatedEnglishLine":"What, what? Is there something going on?"},{"lineNumber":203557,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ん？　ん？　お姉ちゃんに話してみ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh? Huh? Try telling big sister?"},{"lineNumber":203558,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ななな、ないないない！","translatedEnglishLine":"N-n-no no no! There’s nothing!"},{"lineNumber":203559,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんにもないよ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s absolutely nothing!?"},{"lineNumber":203560,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん、本当かなー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, really?"},{"lineNumber":203561,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ミックスは？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What about Mix?"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロビーに行けばあるかな！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder if there’s some in the lobby!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいおい、いないって言ってんだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, hey, I said they’re not here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いーや、こいつは結構こーゆーとこあるからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, this guy is often like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隠してたり、若しくは無自覚とかな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He might be hiding something, or perhaps he's unaware.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくらでも言わない理由は考えられる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are plenty of reasons why he might not say anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、陶器！　酒を用意しろ！
今夜はこいつをべろべろに酔わせて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tonight, we’ll get him completely drunk,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロビーに行けばあるかな！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder if there’s some in the lobby!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 酒が飲みたかっただけじゃないだろうな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You didn’t just want to drink, did you...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決戦前夜なんだ、明日に響かない程度に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s the night before the decisive battle; just enough so it doesn’t affect tomorrow,
So, what were you talking about after all?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うーん、なんと言ったものだすかな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, hmm, how should I put it...
Ah, rather than that, what about the

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 木組みのパズルやるだすか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: wooden puzzle we found at the inn?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へへー、オイラ結構こういうの上手いんだよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, I’m actually pretty good at stuff like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男部屋では酒盛りが始まり、大いに盛り上がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the men's room, the drinking party started and got very lively.
...You were made to drink more than the other brothers by Zansu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の兄弟達より多く飲まされてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You ended up drinking more than the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 賑やかな夜が更けていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The lively night went on into the late hours.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぷはーっ、風呂は入ったし、飯も食った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Phew, I took a bath and ate a meal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナギとレリコフの二人が、
どさーっと布団に飛び込んだ。
「食べた後にすぐ寝るんじゃないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn’t it bad to go to sleep right after eating?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、なんでもかんでも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good grief, making Reset do absolutely everything...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よっしゃ、こういう夜のお約束やろーぜー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let’s do the usual for a night like this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怪談ならウズメにお任せ
「こういう時にすることって言ったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When it comes to what to do at times like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恋の話って相場が決まってるでしょー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: talking about love is the standard, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なになに？　なんかあるのかなー？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, what? Is there something going on?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん？　ん？　お姉ちゃんに話してみ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? Huh? Try telling big sister?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder if there’s some in the lobby!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいおい、いないって言ってんだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, hey, I said they’re not here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いーや、こいつは結構こーゆーとこあるからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, this guy is often like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隠してたり、若しくは無自覚とかな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He might be hiding something, or perhaps he's unaware.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくらでも言わない理由は考えられる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are plenty of reasons why he might not say anything.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tonight, we’ll get him completely drunk,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder if there’s some in the lobby!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 酒が飲みたかっただけじゃないだろうな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You didn’t just want to drink, did you...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決戦前夜なんだ、明日に響かない程度に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s the night before the decisive battle; just enough so it doesn’t affect tomorrow,
So, what were you talking about after all?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うーん、なんと言ったものだすかな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, hmm, how should I put it...
Ah, rather than that, what about the

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 木組みのパズルやるだすか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: wooden puzzle we found at the inn?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へへー、オイラ結構こういうの上手いんだよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, I’m actually pretty good at stuff like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男部屋では酒盛りが始まり、大いに盛り上がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the men's room, the drinking party started and got very lively.
...You were made to drink more than the other brothers by Zansu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の兄弟達より多く飲まされてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You ended up drinking more than the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 賑やかな夜が更けていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The lively night went on into the late hours.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぷはーっ、風呂は入ったし、飯も食った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Phew, I took a bath and ate a meal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナギとレリコフの二人が、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn’t it bad to go to sleep right after eating?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、なんでもかんでも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good grief, making Reset do absolutely everything...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よっしゃ、こういう夜のお約束やろーぜー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let’s do the usual for a night like this!

「こういう時にすることって言ったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When it comes to what to do at times like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恋の話って相場が決まってるでしょー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: talking about love is the standard, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なになに？　なんかあるのかなー？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, what? Is there something going on?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん？　ん？　お姉ちゃんに話してみ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? Huh? Try telling big sister?
